snippet: Some educators see a future where alternative forms of credentials, such as “badges” certifying exactly which skills had been learned, will be widely accepted by employers.
abstract: Advent of Massive Open Online Courses, which do not count toward degrees, has caused some educators to envision a system of 'badges' that would certify exactly which skills an online student has learned; such a system would allow employers to target the skills they are searching for, potentially displacing the broad and expensive system of university degrees.
lead_paragraph: Some educators see a future where alternative forms of credentials, such as “badges” certifying exactly which skills had been learned, will be widely accepted by employers.

headline.seo: Beyond the College Degree, Online Educational Badges
headline.main: Beyond the College Degree, Online Educational Badges
headline.print_headline: Beyond the College Degree, Online Educational Badges
